summary: Implements core IAM authorization logic for the Moto mock AWS library, providing authentication, signature verification, policy parsing and evaluation, and detailed error handling for IAM users, assumed roles, and S3 requests. It also supports creation of temporary credentials and encapsulates policy statements to determine whether actions are permitted.
business_intent: Enable developers to test AWS applications locally by accurately simulating IAM security checks, ensuring that permission boundaries, access keys, and role assumptions behave like the real AWS environment.
